intro: Heterotropa ikegamii, commonly known as the Ikegami's heterotropa, is a rare flowering plant native to Japan. It belongs to the family Rubiaceae, which includes coffee and gardenias. The plant is characterized by its small, clustered flowers with white petals and yellow stamens. It thrives in shaded, moist environments, typically found in forest understories. Due to its limited distribution and habitat specificity, it is considered an endangered species.
